channel.title: leadership on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in leadership on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: The Inner Circle
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The concept of an “inner circle” within a company is not a new one, and at Dwarves, a software company founded by a group of engineers, this idea holds a significant value.

item.title: Delegation And Believe It Will Work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We can’t always make things (or everything) on our own. If that somehow truly happens, then Inc, Corp, Enterprise or Group won’t stand a chance with Freelancers.

item.title: Building A Solid High Performing Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sustainable growth companies are built by teams of shining constellations rather than just several bright stars. It all starts with recruiting.

item.title: Delegate Work Not Responsibility
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We can bring in all the technology in the world, but if we can’t delegate properly, our companies have no chance of scaling well.
